plot: Nick (David Giuntoli) and Hank (Russell Hornsby) investigate a cop killer who scalps his victims. Meanwhile, Juliette (Bitsie Tulloch) begins to communicate with Nick's mom via email and Adalind (Claire Coffee) finds herself much closer to delivering her baby than she previously thought. Elsewhere, Monroe's (Silas Weir Mitchell) parents (guest stars Dee Wallace and Chris Mulkey) decide to surprise him and Rosalee (Bree Turner) with an early arrival to Portland after learning some exciting news.—Anonymous

Nick's team finds out about several murders where the victims were scalped and traces all to a bloodthirsty feral who hunts as part of a complex sacrificial tradition. After treating Rosalee to a romantic dinner, Monroe proposes. They can barely wrap their minds about the implications as his parents, whom he finally tells about his steady relationship, invite themselves presto. Adalind's magical royal baby grows faster then anyone expected.—KGF Vissers
